summary: Completed frontend testing of EchoSphere Discord-clone application. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend authentication flow works (signup successful), but login with test credentials fails with 401 error. Main app loads correctly after signup but cannot be consistently accessed due to authentication issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Login fails with 401 error for test credentials, preventing consistent access to main app

integration_issues.issue: Inconsistent authentication state - signup works but login with same credentials fails
WebSocket connection errors on app load (marked as non-critical)
integration_issues.symptoms: Console: Socket connection error (non-critical): server error

passed_tests: User signup flow - form validation and submission works
Main app loads after successful signup
Server creation modal opens and form fields are accessible
Backend APIs all functional (13/13 tests passed)
Navigation between signup and login pages
Liquid Glass aesthetic UI design loads properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication inconsistency: 1) Login with valid credentials returns 401 error 2) Ensure signup and login use consistent authentication flow 3) Test with actual user credentials or fix test account creation

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (signup, UI loading, form validation work; login authentication fails)
